tool_description: A simple Rock Paper Scissor game API
name: Rock Paper Scissor
title: Rock Paper Scissor

api_list.name: choice
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rock-paper-scissor2.p.rapidapi.com/api/rock"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rock-paper-scissor2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rock-paper-scissor2.p.rapidapi.com/api/{choice}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rock-paper-scissor2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
